com.redhat.rhn.frontend.dto
Class NameDescriptionValue

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.dto.NameDescriptionValue

public class NameDescriptionValue
extends java.lang.Object

NameDescriptionValue - Simple class that can hold a name, a description and a value for a field. Can be used in that have a dynamic set of values where the description field is the header text that is localized. For example: Login: | | | description name value
